latex:
The roots of $ Ax^2 + Bx + C = 0$ are $ r$ and $ s$. For the roots of\\
\[ x^2 + px + q = 0
\]\\
to be $ r^2$ and $ s^2$, $ p$ must equal:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \frac{B^2 - 4AC}{A^2}\qquad 
\textbf{(B)}\ \frac{B^2 - 2AC}{A^2}\qquad 
\textbf{(C)}\ \frac{2AC - B^2}{A^2}\qquad \\
\textbf{(D)}\ B^2 - 2C\qquad 
\textbf{(E)}\ 2C - B^2$
